Which editor?
Which build id?

I can't reproduce this with our editors. We've fixed a similar issue a while ago and we also found an issue in another (non-Eclipse SDK) editor that triggered this.

Closing as WORKSFORME, as there's not much we can do here without steps.

Sorry for missing the details.

This happened in a basic text editor in Jazz (0.6M2d1), which is build on Eclipse 3.3. This occurred the day our repository was down, so the problem may have been triggered by our SCM.
*** Bug 208828 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

We've just moved from 3.3 to the 3.3.1 maintenance release and I continue to see this problem using the regular Text Editor on large files. I was editing a lengthy HTML document all day yesterday and I had to restart Eclipse every few hours because of this bug.
